methods.name: getAttribute
methods.desc: Returns the value of an attribute or an empty string if it doesn't exist.
Returns a map of all the attributes of the current node.

methods.name: insertChildAfter
methods.parameters: const string &name, const ofXml &after

methods.name: insertChildBefore
methods.parameters: const string &name, const ofXml &after

methods.name: load
methods.parameters: const filesystem::path &file

methods.name: save
methods.parameters: const filesystem::path &file
methods.desc: Save the XML object to a file.

methods.name: set
methods.parameters: const unsigned char &value

methods.name: setAttribute
methods.parameters: const string &name, const T &value
methods.desc: Sets attribute at the path indicated. If the attribute doesn't already exist, it's created.

methods.name: toString
methods.desc: Creates a string from the XML document. Useful for when you want to send or save the document.
